title: PM’s efforts against Islamophobia start yielding results: Farrukh
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 30 (APP):Minister of State for Information and Broadcasting Farrukh Habib on Sunday said  Prime Minister Imran Khan’s efforts against Islamophobia at International level had started yielding results.
In a tweet, he lauded Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau for condemning Islamophobia and expressing plan to appoint a special representative to combat the scourge.
Earlier, Russian President Vladimir Putin had called for delinking freedom of expression with blasphemy, he added.
